jobDescription: Data Analytics Manager  Job description: Northern Trust, a leader in the banking industry is looking for a Data Analytics Manager to lead the Infrastructure Engineering Group’s Data Analytics Team. The manager will create solutions which increase stability, create clarity, and reduce the operational costs of highly visible applications and software systems for Northern Trust. In this role you will be involved with using tools and technology to implement solutions that enable software system to recommend or automate data-driven decisions.  This role will require the ability to perform both exploratory Data Science work as well as develop explanatory solutions and implement reactive autonomous systems.
